reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Color lasts a long time, it’s super hydrating. 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's a Pretty Lipstick, Just a few shades too light for me
reviews.reviewText: Firstly, I loved how quickly the product arrived! It actually came three entire days early and that was the highlight of my day. After that...well...Revlon has been my go to lipstick brand for decades so I had no expectations beyond my version of perfection. This includes several touch ups throughout the day, a rich creamy feel, and a beautiful color that compliments so many lipstick wearing people.The color was so beautiful in the photo and true in real life. In the tube, it's a beautiful light coral and what I expected was it to give me a hint of color for my daytime look. Unfortunately, it shows a shimmery nude on me, which isn't what I wanted at all.Overall, while I'll definitely be using products from this seller again (did I mention it came THREE days early???) I won't be purchasing this shade again. Thankfully, Revlon has tons of shades in the coral family, so I know I'll find what I'm looking for soon.Hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this color
reviews.reviewText: "Bare it all " is the color. Perfect for a neutral color that goes with everything. Stays on well , creamy not drying. My skin tone is very light. Will definitely order more .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lipstick
reviews.reviewText: I know Revlon is an older brand however I love the way this lipstick feels on my lips. It’s creamy and it stays on too. It doesn’t dry my lips like other lipsticks do and the color is a beautiful blue red.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very sheer, doesn’t last more than an hour
reviews.reviewText: It’s a pretty, sparkly, brownish color sheer tint, and glides on smooth. The staying power leaves a lot to be desired. This formula requires hourly reapplication.I have another Revlon lipstick in a matte that lasts me for several hours at work.This lipstick doesn’t make it through my first cup of coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this color so much I bought a second tube. It's moist and lasts well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great color, doesn't stay on long
reviews.reviewText: The color is gorgeous and exactly what I wanted. However I am disappointed that the lip stick doesn't stay on long. I really need to stay on top of reapplying to keep the color around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the color - but doesn’t last.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the “Bare It All” color but, I am disappointed in the staying power. I even used a lip primer however, I did use a plumping gloss and a heavy clear balm on top which may have made a bit more slippery. I tried it without the gloss and still didn’t last any longer than about an hour -without eating. It was on sale so I am not disappointed for the beautiful nude color.
Cor linda. Batom gostoso de usar. A boca fica hidratada. Só comprarei desta marca.
I like revlon lipsticks they last long and price is affordable..
Glides on, slight shimmer.Good price - Very nice!
I’ve been looking for this colour for a couple of years, I’ve always used it, then it became unavailable.So glad I could get it from Amazon!
Su color es bonito, es cremoso y no reseca los labios
